resources.string: The option \"%1$s\" has been bought! It will be available soon.
Do you really want to buy the option \"%1$s\" for \"%2$s?\"
You cannot buy options with the app yet.
Buying the option might have failed
Buying the option \"%1$s\" might have failed. Please try again if you do not receive an SMS confirmation soon.
The device must be secured with a PIN or password to buy options.
